data.title: Thomas B. Mansfield & TM Service
data.meta_description: Thomas B. Mansfield & TM Service | 612 followers on LinkedIn. We Are The Most Trusted Sales, Service, And Parts Solution For Commercial And Industrial Boilers In The Rockies | TM Service is Rocky Mountain's most complete boiler maintenance, repair, and replacement company. We cover Colorado Wyoming and Western Nebraska Representing Cleaver-Brooks, Fulton, and Autoflame. Our company is ASME & ISN rated holding our R-Stamp for all code-related service needs.

Join us for an insightful Webinar on Hybrid Heating Plant Solutions! Dive into the world of innovative heating technology designed to cut your carbon footprint while enhancing efficiency. What You'll Learn: ğŸ”¹ Market Drive for Electrification: Understand the growing trend towards electrification and its impact on the heating industry. ğŸ”¹ Carbon Footprint Analysis: Explore the environmental impact of common hydronic heating devices. ğŸ”¹ Electrical Grid Impact: Learn how the electrical grid influences the net carbon footprint of electrified devices. ğŸ”¹ Performance Challenges: Address the hurdles associated with air-to-water heat pumps. ğŸ”¹ Hybrid Solutions: Discover how combining heat pumps with backup boilers can overcome these challenges and still meet your carbon reduction goals. ğŸ“… Date: 8/28 Noon MST ğŸ“ Location: https://buff.ly/4fwbdDw Donâ€™t miss out on this opportunity to enhance your knowledge and contribute to a greener future. ğŸŒOur Summer Interns ğŸŒ„ Last Friday, TM Service had the pleasure of taking our three interns on an excursion to Mt. Blue Sky, where we enjoyed showcasing the natural beauty of Colorado. Ricky, Rob, and Shane have spent the summer diligently honing their skills in the boiler industry. They have gained valuable experience through their hands-on work with us, and their growth is evident as they prepare to return to the East Coast. We are excited to witness your continued development this upcoming school year and hope to welcome the freshmen back next summer for further learning opportunities. We look forward to seeing everyone again for our company-wide event in three weeks! Interested in joining our team? Learn more here: https://buff.ly/3KCt9iw

ğŸ”™ #ThrowbackThursday to industrial grit and timeless reliability! This vintage boiler embodies the sturdy foundation of our industrial heating legacy. At Thomas B. Mansfield, we've been powering industries since 1963. From classic boilers to cutting-edge solutions, our journey is marked by an unwavering commitment to industrial heating excellence. Embracing our industrial heritage, remember that we're always ready for your emergency service needs 24/7! Call us at 303-781-7878 to experience the expertise that sets us apart. Happy Independence Day from all of us at TBM & TMS! Emergency services are always available, Give us a call at 303.781.7878 ext.1 Our office will be closed on Thursday, July 4th, 2024 we will resume operations on Friday 7/5/2024 #4thOfJuly #Boiler #Emergencyservice

TMS is the Rocky Mountain Boiler Room Expert. With over 150 years of combined boiler experience, we are committed to quality and safety no matter what facility! Welcome to TMS! TMS are the premier provider of boilers and boiler room solutions in Colorado, Wyoming, and Nebraska for over five decades. Our team of experienced professionals is committed to delivering exceptional service and quality products that exceed your expectations. Whether you're in need of a new boiler installation, regular maintenance, or emergency repair services, we have the expertise and resources to keep your boiler running safely and efficiently. Our comprehensive range of products and services includes boiler sales, rentals, parts, and accessories. Contact us today to learn how we can help you achieve optimal boiler performance and maximum energy savings. Give us a call today at 303.781.7878 Check out our newly updated website: TMS offers emergency services 24/7/365: Call us today at 303.781.7878 ext.1
